projects.name: GameHub
projects.description: GameHub is a game discovery platform that lets users search over 350,000 games by platform, genre, release date, popularity, and rating, powered by the RAWG API.

projects.name: Cordial Chat
projects.description: Cordial Chat is a web app for conversing with Google's Gemini 1.5, supporting 15 RPM, 1,000,000 TPM, and 1,500 RPD, with multi-threaded chat and local conversation storage.

projects.name: Movienest API
projects.description: MovieNest API is a server-side application for managing movie rentals and returns. It features admin authentication, customer management, and movie-genre categorization, enabling secure and efÔ¨Åcient rental operation.

projects.name: Syncdesk
projects.description: SyncDesk is an internal issue-management tool designed to help teams create, assign, and track tasks from start to resolution. It streamlines workflow by keeping all issues organized in one place, giving users clear visibility into progress, deadlines, and responsibilities.
